title: NY officials detect polio again, warn of possible summer wave
description: With new detection, officials warn of spring and summer transmission risks.

title: The power of AI compels you to believe this fake image of Pope in a puffy coat
description: Faux “puffy pontiff” AI image fools many in viral social media post.

title: Biden’s executive order limits government’s use of commercial spyware
description: Move comes as "clickless exploits" targets journalists and others accused of no crimes.

title: Dealmaster: 1-day-only Nintendo Switch, Microsoft 365 deals; plus PS5 and AirTags
description: Nintendo's Switch OLED is on a rare one-day-only discount.

title: Apple rolls out iOS 16.4 and macOS Ventura 13.3 with new emoji and features
description: They offer small quality-of-life tweaks and important accessibility features.

title: Today’s the last day to buy eShop games for the Wii U and 3DS
description: Titles unavailable elsewhere in Nintendo's ecosystem can no longer be purchased.

title: Hobbyist builds ChatGPT client for MS-DOS
description: Hobbyist client allows futuristic AI conversations on vintage hardware.

title: Musk says Twitter value is down to $20 billion, calls firm an “inverse startup”
description: Musk email to staff: "I see a clear, but difficult path" to $250 billion value.

title: Webb Telescope confirms nearby rocky planet has no atmosphere
description: A close look at one of TRAPPIST-1's planets shows it's bare and baking.

title: Google is killing most of Fitbit’s social features today
description: Google is shutting down Challenges and Adventures, stripping trophies from users.

title: Publishers beat Internet Archive as judge rules e-book lending violates copyright
description: Internet Archive: Judge’s copyright ruling is a “blow to all libraries.”

title: Twitter source code was leaked on GitHub shortly after Musk’s layoff spree
description: Twitter suspects code leaker is ex-employee, which doesn't narrow it down much.

title: We drive the most hardcore Toyota Corolla ever: The GR Morizo Edition
description: Toyota will only build 200 of these hand-built hot hatches this year, perhaps ever.

title: Blue Origin provides a detailed analysis of its launch failure
description: The company says it intends to return to flight "soon."

title: Android app from China executed 0-day exploit on millions of devices
description: Fast-growing e-commerce app Pinduoduo had an EvilParcel stow-away.

title: Would building a Dyson sphere be worth it? We ran the numbers.
description: Here's the math behind making a star-encompassing megastructure.
